mapper.sql: ph.PO_HEADER_ID, ph.PO_NUMBER, ph.MARKET_ID, ph.ORDER_DATE, ph.PO_TO, ph.VENDOR_NAME, ph.DELIVERY_TO, ph.CONTACTS, ph.FAX, ph.PHONE, ph.EXPECTED_DATE, ph.INCOTERM, ph.CURRENCY, ph.DELIVERY_ADDRESS, ph.REMARK, ph.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, ph.REQUEST_ID, ph.PROGRAM_ID, ph.CREATION_DATE, ph.CREATED_BY, ph.LAST_UPDATED_BY, ph.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ph.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ph.ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ph.ATTRIBUTE1, ph.ATTRIBUTE2, ph.ATTRIBUTE3, ph.ATTRIBUTE4, ph.ATTRIBUTE5, ph.ATTRIBUTE6, ph.ATTRIBUTE7, ph.ATTRIBUTE8, ph.ATTRIBUTE9, ph.ATTRIBUTE10, ph.ATTRIBUTE11, ph.ATTRIBUTE12, ph.ATTRIBUTE13, ph.ATTRIBUTE14, ph.ATTRIBUTE15,ph.AREA_CODE,ph.TRX_NUMBER
mapper.select: select ,ist.STATUS from PO_HEADER ph,INV_STOCK_TRX ist where PO_HEADER_ID = #{poHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ph.TRX_NUMBER = ist.TRX_NUMBER
mapper.insert:
select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000+floor(rand()*1000) from dual

update PO_HEADER
PO_NUMBER = #{poNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARKET_ID = #{marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

DELIVERY_ADDRESS = #{deliveryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

TRX_NUMBER = #{trxNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

CREATION_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where PO_HEADER_ID = #{poHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
